original_text: Woe to them that are at ease in Zion, and trust in the mountain of Samaria, which are named chief of the nations, to whom the house of Israel came!
korean_text: 화 있을진저 시온에서 교만한 자와 사마리아 산에서 마음이 든든한 자 곧 백성들의 머리인 지도자들이여 이스라엘 집이 그들을 따르는도다

sentences.original_text: that are at ease in Zion
and trust in the mountain of Samaria
which are named chief of the nations
to whom the house of Israel came
